name: Astro Slide & Match 3
description:
Test your reaction and agility in this exciting space themed sliding and matching game, featuring three different and addictive modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous space packed levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

FEATURES

- Super-charged match-3 puzzle game play.
- Uniquely different modes; Arcade, Score Panic and Zen.
- Gorgeous space themed pieces; asteroid, planet, rocket, comet, space jewel, space rock and many more.
- Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master.
- Amazing power ups and special cosmic effects. We've got zappers, board blasters, nukes, rockets and many more.
- Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who’s really the master of the universe!
- Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves.

ARCADE MODE
Fast paced space matching fun is on offer in the Arcade mode. Test your skill and reflexes as you race to complete the level before the timer overpowers you.

SCORE PANIC
Can you reach the target score before your time runs out? The target score is increased after every level making this mode more and more challenging. Just don't panic!

ZEN
Relax and chill in Zen mode, without a timer to harry and panic, you can lay back and focus on an addictive, never ending game of match.
